== KPN Hi Bluetooth dial-up networking ==
This information complements the more generic BluetoothDialup guide.

For a KPN Hi connection use:
<pre>
TIMEOUT 35
ECHO    ON
ABORT   '\nBUSY\r'
ABORT   '\nERROR\r'
ABORT   '\nNO ANSWER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO CARRIER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO DIALTONE\r'
ABORT   '\nRINGING\r\n\r\nRINGING\r'
''      \rAT
TIMEOUT 12
OK      ATZ
OK      'AT+CGDCONT=1,"IP","internet",,0,0'
OK      ATD*99***1#
CONNECT ""

</pre>
